title: Google | Bengaluru | Senior Software Engineer (L5) | Full stack
content:
Education: BE in Eelectronica & Telecom from Teir 3 college
Years of Experience: 6.5 
Prior Experience: L62 at Microsoft
Date of the Offer: Oct 2024
Company: Google
Title/Level: Senior Software Engineer (L5)
Location: Bengaluru, India
Salary: 65,00,000 INR
Relocation: 4,50,000 INR
Signing Bonus: 6,00,000 INR
Stock bonus: $280,000 stock grant vested over 4 years (38%, 32%, 20%, 10%)
Bonus: Performance-based bonus up to 15% of salary every year
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): ~ 1.6 cr INR
Benefits: Standard google india benefits
Other details: I had 3-4 compteting offers, but they played no major role in the comp discussion.

Interview Experience : https://leetcode.com/discuss/interview-experience/5964088/Google-or-L5-or-Bengaluru-or-Oct-2024-Offer

title: JIO | SDE2 | Bengaluru | September [Offer]
content:
Education: Tier:1-2B.Tech in Computer Science
Years of Experience: 3+
Prior Experience: SSE at a Service Based Company
Current CTC : 14 LPA


Date of the Offer: September 2024
Company: Jio
Title/Level: Software Developer
Location: Bengaluru
Salary: ₹21,00,000
Relocation: ₹0
Signing Bonus: ₹2,00,000
Stock bonus: ₹0
Perfomance Bonus: ₹2,10,000
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): ₹25,10,000(for first year)


Other Details : Declined the offer as I had lost interest in joining them.


Interview Experience :
https://leetcode.com/discuss/interview-experience/5967289/JIO-or-SDE2-or-Bengaluru-or-September-Offer

title: Coupang | L5 | Senior SDE | Bangalore
content:
Education: Tier-2
Years of Experience: 5 years+
Current Experience: SDE 2(e-commerce)
Current salary: 48 LPA (34 LPA base , 14 LPA Esops)
Date: Oct
Company: Coupang
Title/Level: Senior Software Engineer - L5
Location: Bangalore
Salary: 54 LPA
Relocation bonus : 12.5 Lakhs
Variable pay: 5.4 LPA
Stocks :  59 lakhs for 4 years 
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): 87.5 Lakhs (first year)
